name: Humvee Car Parking
description:
Simple nice simulation humvee car parking game
Real 3D parking game with nice humvee car and real beautiful industrial city
Nice 3D humvee car parking and car racing, rally game
How fast your will drive and parking your car complete all 11 levels well ??
This game is very basic of parking game you can play, just using gas, break, steer right, steer left buttons to control your humvee car to parking spot. And there are switching vision of camera button you can use for more easy of parking.
There are 11 levels of humvee car parking, racing, rally you can play, time parked will be recorded and displayed on final scene completing.
Test your driving and parking skills in this new and exciting 3D Truck Parking game!
A UNIQUE DRIVING EXPERIENCE WITH GORGEOUS 3D GRAPHICS
Your goal in this game is to park in the designated locations while avoiding obstacles.
There is a time limit to keep you on your toes.
If you have never driven a humvee car before, then this game will give you that unique experience of driving a humvee vehicle.
It's very different experience from driving a sports cars or a compact car like you may have experienced in racing games such as "Need for Speed", "Asphalt 7", or "Real Racing".
Your precision driving skills will be tested and pushed to the limit!
Humvee Car Parking 3D features:
11 Exciting levels!
- Beautiful 3D graphics
- Unique Humvee driving experience!
- Beautiful 3D army humvee car model!
